newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Philippine mutual funds net asset values.
newsitem.headline: Philippine mutual funds net asset values.

text.p: The following are the net asset values of Philippine mutual funds for Tuesday, January 14 FUNDS NAV PER DAILY YEAR TO DATE

Growth 1.4400 -0.36 +3.25 First Galleon 1.0133 -0.18 +1.89 Philam Fund 3.8399 +0.12 +0.64 Philequity Fund 2.2101 +0.22 +4.19 United Fund 1.1887 +0.26 +0.77 Kabuhayan Fund 1.0595 +0.09 +2.28 Filipino Fund Inc. 1.2224 -0.02 +0.95 * * This is a closed-end fund
Information provided by the Investment Company Association of the Philippines, an association of the country's mutual funds.
